goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 4.0 MB)
indicator_definition: Proportion of water bodies (area) in a country with good ambient water quality compared to all water bodies in the country. “Good” indicates an ambient water quality that does not damage ecosystem function and human health according to core ambient water quality indicators.
indicator_name: Proportion of bodies of water with good ambient water quality
target: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally
graph_title: 6.3.2 Proportion of bodies of water with good ambient water quality
title: Untitled
national_indicator_available: 6.3.2 Proportion of bodies of water with good ambient water quality

ro.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 4.0 MB)
ro.indicator_definition: Proportion of water bodies (area) in a country with good ambient water quality compared to all water bodies in the country. “Good” indicates an ambient water quality that does not damage ecosystem function and human health according to core ambient water quality indicators.
ro.indicator_name: Proporția corpurilor de apă cu calitate bună a apei ambientale
ro.target: Până în 2030, îmbunătățirea calității apei prin reducerea poluării, eliminarea depozitării deșeurilor și reducerea la minimum a  produselor chimice și materialelor periculoase, înjumătățind proporția apelor uzate netratate și sporind substanțial reciclarea și reutilizarea sigură la nivel global
ro.graph_title: 6.3.2 Proporția corpurilor de apă cu calitate bună a apei ambientale
ro.title: Untitled
ro.national_indicator_available: 6.3.2 Proporția corpurilor de apă cu calitate bună a apei ambientale
